00030    using namespace Util;
00031    
00032    const int BennettsMethod::TagDerivative[2]    = {1, 2};
00033    const int BennettsMethod::TagFermi[2]    = {8, 9};
00034 
00035    /* 
00036    * Constructor.
00037    */
00038    BennettsMethod::BennettsMethod(System& system)
00039     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00040       shift_(0.0),
00041       lowerShift_(0.0),
00042       shifts_(),
00043       communicatorPtr_(0),
00044       myId_(-1),
00045       nProcs_(0),
00046       lowerId_(-1),
00047       upperId_(-1),
00048       nParameter_(0),
00049       myParam_(),
00050       lowerParam_(),
00051       upperParam_(),
00052       nSamplePerBlock_(1),
00053       myAccumulator_(),
00054       upperAccumulator_(),
00055       myArg_(0.0),
00056       lowerArg_(0.0),
00057       myFermi_(0.0),
00058       lowerFermi_(0.0),
00059       upperFermi_(0.0),
00060       outputFile_()
00061    {  
00062       communicatorPtr_ = &(system.simulation().communicator());
00063       myId_   = communicatorPtr_->Get_rank();
00064       nProcs_ = communicatorPtr_->Get_size();   
00065       if (myId_ != 0) { 
00066          lowerId_ = myId_ - 1;
00067       } else {
00068          lowerId_ = myId_;
00069       }
00070       if (myId_ != nProcs_-1) {
00071          upperId_ = myId_ + 1;
00072       } else {
00073          upperId_ = myId_;
00074       }
00075       nParameter_ = system.perturbation().getNParameters(); 
00076       myParam_.allocate(nParameter_);
00077       lowerParam_.allocate(nParameter_);
00078       upperParam_.allocate(nParameter_);
00079    }
00080 
00081    /*
00082    * Read parameters and initialize.
00083    */
00084    void BennettsMethod::readParam(std::istream& in)
00085    {
00086       readInterval(in);
00087       readOutputFileName(in);
00088 
00089       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00090  
00091       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00092       if (hasParamCommunicator()) {
00093          shifts_.allocate(nProcs_);
00094          shifts_[nProcs_-1]=0.0;
00095          readDArray<double>(in, "shifts", shifts_, nProcs_-1);
00096          shift_ = shifts_[myId_];
00097       } else {
00098          read<double>(in, "shift", shift_);
00099       }
00100       #else
00101       read<double>(in, "shift", shift_);
00102       #endif
00103       
00104       myAccumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00105       upperAccumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00106 
00107    }
00108     
00109    void BennettsMethod::setup()
00110    { 
00111       communicatorPtr_->Bcast((void*)&shifts_[0], nProcs_, MPI::DOUBLE, 0);
00112       if ( myId_ != 0 ) {
00113          lowerShift_ = shifts_[lowerId_];
00114       } else {}
00115    }
00116 
00117    void BennettsMethod::sample(long iStep) 
00118    {
00119       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00120 
00121       int myPort, upperPort;
00122       MPI::Request requestFermi[2];
00123       MPI::Status  status;
00124 
00125       // Exchange perturbation parameters and differences
00126       if (myId_ != 0 && myId_ != nProcs_ - 1) {
00127          myPort = myId_%2;
00128          upperPort = upperId_%2;
00129 
00130          for (int i = 0; i < nParameter_; ++i) {
00131             myParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00132             lowerParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i,lowerId_);
00133             upperParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i,upperId_);
00134          }
00135          
00136          myArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(upperParam_);
00137          lowerArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(lowerParam_);
00138 
00139          myArg_ -= shift_;
00140          lowerArg_ += lowerShift_;
00141             
00142          myFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(myArg_));
00143          lowerFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(lowerArg_));
00144             
00145          requestFermi[0] = communicatorPtr_->Irecv(&upperFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, upperId_,
00146                                              TagFermi[upperPort]);
00147             
00148          requestFermi[1] = communicatorPtr_->Isend(&lowerFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, lowerId_,
00149                                              TagFermi[myPort]);
00150             
00151          // Synchronizing
00152          requestFermi[0].Wait();
00153          requestFermi[1].Wait();
00154 
00155          upperAccumulator_.sample(upperFermi_);
00156          myAccumulator_.sample(myFermi_);
00157  
00158          } else if (myId_ == 0) {
00159             
00160             myPort = myId_%2;
00161             upperPort = upperId_%2;
00162 
00163             for (int i = 0; i < nParameter_; ++i) {
00164                myParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00165                upperParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i, upperId_);
00166             }
00167 
00168             myArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(upperParam_);
00169             myArg_ -= shift_;
00170             
00171             myFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(myArg_));
00172             
00173             requestFermi[0] = communicatorPtr_->Irecv(&upperFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, upperId_,
00174                                               TagFermi[upperPort]);
00175              
00176             // Synchronizing
00177             requestFermi[0].Wait();
00178             
00179             upperAccumulator_.sample(upperFermi_);
00180             myAccumulator_.sample(myFermi_);
00181 
00182          } else if (myId_ == nProcs_ - 1) {
00183             
00184             myPort = myId_%2;
00185 
00186             for (int i = 0; i < nParameter_; ++i) {
00187                myParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00188                lowerParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i, lowerId_);
00189             }
00190 
00191             lowerArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(lowerParam_);
00192             lowerArg_ += lowerShift_;
00193             
00194             lowerFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(lowerArg_));
00195             
00196             requestFermi[1] = communicatorPtr_->Isend(&lowerFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, lowerId_,
00197                                                TagFermi[myPort]);
00198          
00199             // Synchronizing
00200             requestFermi[1].Wait();
00201         }
00202    }
00203 
00204    void BennettsMethod::analyze()
00205    {
00206       double EnergyDiff, ratio, improvedShift;
00207       if (myId_ != nProcs_ - 1) {
00208        
00209          ratio = upperAccumulator_.average()/myAccumulator_.average();
00210       
00211          EnergyDiff = log(ratio)+shift_;
00212       
00213          improvedShift = EnergyDiff;
00214             
00215          shifts_[myId_] = improvedShift; 
00216          shift_ = improvedShift; 
00217     
00218       } else {}
00219    
00220    }
00221    
00222    
00223    // Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00224    void BennettsMethod::output() 
00225    {
00226       analyze(); 
00227 
00228       communicatorPtr_->Gather((const void *) &shift_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, (void *) &shifts_[0], 1, MPI::DOUBLE, 0);
00229       int i;
00230       if (myId_ == 0) {
00231          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00232          for (i = 0; i < nProcs_-1; ++i) {
00233             outputFile_ << Dbl(shifts_[i]);
00234             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00235          }
00236          outputFile_.close();
00237       
00238       } else {}
00239    }
00240 }
